name: RevokeUserSessions
description:
Revoke all active sessions for a user in Okta.

Use this tool to revoke all active identity provider sessions for a specified user in Okta. This action requires the user to re-authenticate on the next action. Optionally, you can also revoke associated OpenID Connect and OAuth tokens and clear remembered factors across devices. This does not affect sessions for web or native apps.

parameters.name: okta_user_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for an existing Okta user whose sessions will be revoked.

value_schema.description: ID of an existing Okta user

parameters.name: revoke_oauth_tokens
parameters.description: Set to true to revoke issued OpenID Connect and OAuth refresh and access tokens.

value_schema.description: Revokes issued OpenID Connect and OAuth refresh and access tokens

parameters.name: clear_remembered_factors_for_all_devices
parameters.description: Set to true to clear the user's remembered factors for all devices. Defaults to false in Classic Engine.

value_schema.description:
Clears the user's remembered factors for all devices.
> **Note:** This parameter defaults to false in Classic Engine.
